attributes.action: Stop attacking the most vulnerable in society
attributes.additional_details: There are so many other areas where change can be made to make savings but targeting the most vulnerable is the easy way out.
attributes.background: Since this Labour government have come in there has been numerous attacks on the most vulnerable, whether that’s the elderly or disabled.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about vulnerable people in society, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918

Protect Disability Benefits: Stop Changes to PIP and Universal Credit
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721828

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547

Reverse changes to Winter Fuel Payment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700074
